amendatorysection.para: The findings and orders of the department, an application approval, and an approval to operate any dam issued by the department are final, conclusive, and binding upon all owners and state agencies, regulatory or otherwise, as to the safety of design, construction, reconstruction, enlargement, alteration, breach, removal, or abandonment of any dam.
The department may report all dam incidents as defined by the National Performance of Dams Program to the National Performance of Dams Program archive.
